name: live-nuts
description: Live HTML template engine using NUTS syntax

scripts.mtest: npm run build && node ./node_modules/zuul/bin/zuul --ui mocha-bdd -- test/*.js
scripts.build: cat build_assets/start.txt src/live-nuts.js build_assets/end.txt > dist/live-nuts.js && uglifyjs dist/live-nuts.js -c -m -o dist/live-nuts.min.js

author: Jacobo Tabernero - jacobo@xarope.eu
